Adventurers' Guide for Training:
Do you feel that? Even with the same armor and weapons, you are significantly more powerful than you were.
But the power is temporary. If the effect runs out, come see us Adventurers' Guides. We will know when you are near. We will help you.
Enough talk. Go ahead and give that Scarecrow a few more whacks. You'll see you will be able to demolish it much faster.
